DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator to identify patient/participants who were diagnosed with another cancer prior to study entry.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a prior cancer diagnosis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:A tumor composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues.  Malignant neoplasms usually metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision.  The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas (adenocarcinomas or squamous cell carcinomas), Hodgkin's and non-Hodgkin's lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas. -- 2004

Concepts.definition: A neoplasm composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues. Malignant neoplasms often metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision. The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas, Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas.

Property.preferredDefinition: The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ClassificationSchemeItems.longName: Unconjugated Isoflavones in Women at High Risk for Breast Cancer

ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had any other cancer(s) prior to this lung cancer, including previous lung cancer?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had a prior invasive solid tumor or hematological malignancy (except non-melanomatous skin cancer or incidentally discovered prostate cancer at the time of cystoprostatectomy) unless disease free for a minimum of 3 years?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient have a cancer diagnosis < 21 years of age, irrespective of current age?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the participant have a history of prior malignancy

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had a prior invasive malignancy (except non-melanomatous skin cancer) within the last 1 year?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had any prior cancer diagnosed other than cervical cancer?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF_TEXT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had a prior invasive malignancy, excluding current diagnosis and/or non-melanomatous skin cancer,within  the last 2 years?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of another primary malignancy, with the exception of a) Curatively treated non-melanomatous skin cancer; b) curatively treated cervical carcinoma in situ;  c) non-metastatic prostate cancer;  d) other primary non-hematologic malignancies or solid tumor treated with curative intent, no known active disease, and no treatment administered during the last 3 years prior to registration

ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior or current invasive malignancy with current evidence of active disease within the past 3 years

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF_Text 12

ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had a prior invasive malignancy (except non-melanomatous skin cancer)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_TEXT13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had an active malignancy within the last 2 years (other than the study cancer or the allowable cancers listed in 3.3 of the protocol)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient have a cancer diagnosis < 22 years of age, irrespective of current age?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had a prior invasive malignancy (other than those allowed per section 3.3 of the protocol) within the last 3 years?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had an active malignancy within the last 2 years that may alter the course of prostate cancer treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text 18
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had a prior invasive malignancy (other than those allowed per section 3.3 of the protocol) within the last 2 years?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF text20
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a prior or concurrent malignancy (other than keratinocyte carcinoma or carcinoma in situ) whose natural history or treatment does not have the potential to interfere with the safety or efficacy assessment of the investigational regimen with no evidence of disease for more than 3 years?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text19
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had an active malignancy within the last 3 years (other than the study cancer or the allowable cancers listed in 3.2 of the protocol)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF TEXT 21
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had a prior non-head and neck invasive malignancy (except non-melanomatous skin cancer, including effectively treated basal cell or squamous cell skin cancer) unless disease free for 2 or more years?

ReferenceDocuments.name: WF1805CD
ReferenceDocuments.description: History of any other cancer, other than non-melanoma skin disease.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF TEXT 20
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had a prior non-head and neck invasive malignancy (except non-melanomatous skin cancer, including effectively treated basal cell or squamous cell skin cancer) unless disease free for ≥ 2 calendar years?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had a prior history of malignancy (except desmoid tumor(s) and non-melanomatous skin cancer) that are not in remission for more than 3 years?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG-CRF_TEXT 22
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had a prior or current invasive malignancy (other than those allowed per section 3.3 of the protocol) with current evidence of active disease within the last 2 years?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text_24
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had an active malignancy within the last 5 years (other than the study cancer or the allowable cancers listed in 3.2 of the protocol)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 21
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a prior or concurrent malignancy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_TEXT 23
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a prior or concurrent malignancy whose natural history or treatment does not have the potential to interfere with the safety or efficacy assessment of the investigational regimen?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TExt 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient have previous cancer that required systemic chemotherapy and/or thoracic radiation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 22
ReferenceDocuments.description: History of another primary malignancy except for malignancy treated with curative intent with no known active disease for greater than or equal to 2 years, and adequately treated non-melanomatous skin cancer or carcinoma in situ (e.g. cervical CIS) without evidence of disease

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 101
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient have previous cancer that required systemic chemotherapy and/or thoracic radiation and has not been in remission for three years?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 102
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient have previous cancer that required systemic chemotherapy and/or thoracic radiation and has not been in remission for three years?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_20
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior invasive malignancy (except non-melanomatous skin cancer) unless disease free for a minimum of 3 years (a history or current diagnosis of hematologic malignancy is not allowed)

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text_25
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had a prior metastatic or non-metastatic,  invasive malignancy (except non metastatic,non-melanomatous skin cancer) unless continuously disease free for greater than or equal to 3 years?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Evidence of a prior cancer (excluding non-melanoma skin cancer) within 3 years of the designated clinician visit.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of prior or concurrent malignancy whose natural history or treatment has the potential to interfere with the safety or efficacy assessment of the investigational regimen on this trial?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of prior or concurrent malignancy whose natural history or treatment has the potential to interfere with the safety or efficacy assessment of the investigational regimen on this trial?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has had previous head and neck cancer or multiple synchronous primary head and neck cancers.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a concurrent malignancy whose natural history or treatment has the potential to interfere with the safety or efficacy assessments of the investigational regimen?

ReferenceDocuments.name: AMC CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the participant been diagnosed with or treated for cancer within the last 5 years?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the participant have a current or prior (within the last 5 years) diagnosis of cancer that meets one of the three qualifying categories?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the participant had more than 1 prior cancer within 5 years? Do not report the cancer that qualified the participant for study participation

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text_27
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had a prior invasive malignancy (other than those allowed per section 3.2 of the protocol) within the last 3 years?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of any cancer(s) other than ALL or AML?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior hematologic or invasive solid tumor malignancy (except non-melanomatous skin cancer) unless disease and treatment free for a minimum of 3 years.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the participant have a first time diagnosis of non-metastatic breast cancer which is Stage I-III?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was patient previously diagnosed with another cancer other than the one enrolled for this study?
